page.title: 04HOME LIFE IN SWANMORE
page.content: {Susie:}The best thing about my home is the settee in the living room. When I sit on it I feel safe and warm and cosy. {Jacob:}My bedroom has a light by the side of my bed so I feel cosy and I can switch it on if I feel creepy at night. {Kate:}My cooker in the kitchen can boil four lots of vegetables on top and roast meat in the oven at the same time. {Gillian:}I help Mummy get the dinner ready. I peel potatoes to boil and Mummy cooks the meat. {Rebecca:}My favourite meal is chicken and chips. These are chopped up potatoes fried in oil.{ {Christopher:}My pet dog has to be fed with meat and hard biscuits and water. I brush his hairy body to keep it clean. {Kirsty:}If my dog gets muddy I bath him. I take him for long walks to keep him fit.
